title: Disconnected and can't reconnect
body: This is starting to happen to me every other game now.  In the middle of the game, it says reconnecting, and no matter how long I wait it won't reconnect. So I'm forced to leave the game and try to reconnect, but it won't let me reconnect. I get put on a black screen for a few second then a message pops up saying "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game." with the option to retry or cancel. Retrying doesn't do anything, and force quitting then retrying doesn't help either. I've tried restarting the whole client, but that doesn't help either. And there's nothing wrong with my internet, because I'm using discord on the same computer to talk to friends while playing and there are no interruptions there. My friend tells me Riot doesn't care for its Mac users, so maybe thats the problem. Does anyone have the same problem or know a fix?

replies.body: about to start a game in draft mode, countdown finishes and i get a new screen that's onlt option is to reconnect. i click reconnect and page glitches and im still on same page. im assuming game has started by now...... why can i not connect?????
i have restarted client several times, i am using the internet right now to see this forum... restarted router anyway. turned wifi on n off.... still no change. WHAT DO I DO to make this game work???

This issue often happens when your client has an unstable connection to the server. The Mac client is particularly sensitive to drops in connectivity or packet loss. As a first step, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac), as it addresses the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if you continue to have issues after working through that guide.
Worked through the guide, and nothing helped. Just disconnected again and got a 20 minute low priority queue for 5 games. Any other way's to fix this that you know of?

Since changing local settings didn't resolve this, It's likely that the issue is along your route to the server. I recommend reaching out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), and providing a summary of your issue and what you've already tried.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I would have this error sometimes, It was due to me having a slow internet connection. If your internet is not slow then I would check if anything it making it go slower like your firewall for example or try opening up task manager. Hope this helped!
